entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
